vote.text: Amendment SA 3438 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3438 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Risch to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5499) To strike section 531.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3438 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Risch to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3438 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
